Linda Robson has dropped half a stone in just eight days after cutting out sugar from her diet. 
The Loose Women panellist recently agreed to ditch sugar completely after admitting she drank a bottle of wine a night and finding out she consumed the equivalent of 100 doughnuts in sugar a month. 
Linda only began the diet last Wednesday, but on today’s Loose Women, she revealed how well it’s already working – even dropping a dress size. 
She said: “I still don’t know how much I weigh but I’ve lost between six and seven pounds in eight days. Read More Linda has lost half a stone in 8 days (Photo: ITV) Linda Robson (Photo: ITV) 
“The wine belly has gone down quite a lot already. 
"For the first time in a while I’m in a size 14, this shirt is new and it’s a size 14." 
Now, when she’s at home, Linda will drink sparkling water and mints while watching TV, rather than a glass of wine. 
The 58 year old explained: “It’s not as hard as it was but I’m still struggling, it’s just having that something in your hand. Read More Linda Robson (Photo: ITV) 
"We distract ourselves, we’ve been watching The Crown on Netflix." 
But Linda’s a bit worried she’s going to fall off the wagon this week when she goes to Florida to film a competition for Loose Women. 
She said: "That’s going to be quite hard but Alison Hammond is going with me and she’s doing Sugar Free Farm so we’re going to help each other."
